description.brief: Raw strength and weapon mastery damage that scales with physical prowess and represents the warrior's disciplined path.
description.detailed: Physical damage embodies the perfection of body and weapon working in harmony. Unlike elemental forces that manipulate external energies, physical damage represents the mastery of self - the discipline to forge both strength and technique into a unified whole. This damage type scales with training, equipment mastery, and the warrior's dedication to their craft.
description.visual_effects: Powerful weapon strikes with metallic impacts, dust clouds from impacts, and aura effects showing physical enhancement
description.lore_explanation: Physical damage channels the teachings of Drakmorth, the Iron Champion - the great dragon god who embodies the warrior's path. This represents not mere brutality, but the discipline, honor, and physical mastery that forge true champions through dedicated practice.

status_effects.description: Reduces damage dealt by 10% per stack, up to 50%
Reduces accuracy and critical chance by 25%
Target takes 15% increased damage from all sources

special_mechanics.name: Weapon Mastery
special_mechanics.description: Physical damage increases with weapon proficiency and training

special_mechanics.name: Honor Strikes
special_mechanics.description: Critical hits with physical damage can inspire nearby allies

special_mechanics.name: Iron Will
special_mechanics.description: High physical damage builds resistance to mental effects

special_mechanics.name: Champion's Presence
special_mechanics.description: Physical prowess provides defensive bonuses to the wielder

vs_chaos.effect: Physical discipline provides +25% resistance to chaos effects

vs_holy.effect: Holy light enhances physical strikes, adding +15% damage

vs_elemental.effect: Weapons can be enhanced with elemental effects for combined damage

with_stats.weapon_mastery: Direct multiplier to all weapon damage
with_stats.honor_rating: Defensive bonuses and ally inspiration effects

lore_details.primal_god_connection: Draws from Drakmorth, the Iron Champion, one of the three Primal Gods
lore_details.dragon_teachings: Embodies the dragon's wisdom that strength without honor is brutality, honor without strength is empty idealism
lore_details.warrior_path: Represents the disciplined pursuit of physical and mental excellence
lore_details.forge_connection: Physical mastery is forged in the crucible of dedicated practice, like metal in a smith's fire
lore_details.champion_ideal: True champions inspire others through their dedication and skill, not just their strength

training_requirements.weapon_proficiency: Each weapon type requires dedicated training to unlock full potential
training_requirements.physical_conditioning: Base physical stats must be developed through practice and challenge
training_requirements.honor_code: Following warrior principles enhances effectiveness and unlocks special abilities
training_requirements.mastery_progression: Advanced techniques require both physical capability and mental discipline

divine_trio_dynamics.trio_interactions: Physical discipline contains what Chaos would scatter, Radiance illuminates the honor within Physical strength. Chaos breaks Physical's rigid forms, Physical grounds Radiance's ethereal power, Radiance purifies what Physical force might corrupt. The eternal balance of order, change, and illumination.
divine_trio_dynamics.cross_trio_relationship: Primal gods work within Fundamental structures but actively reshape reality. Physical mastery harnesses Fire's transformative power, resists Lightning's disruption through disciplined focus, and provides the stable foundation that Cold's preservation requires.

interaction_explanation.strong_against: Fire and Radiance - Disciplined martial prowess channels raw transformative heat and focuses divine energy through trained will
interaction_explanation.weak_against: Lightning and Chaos - Electrical speed bypasses physical positioning, chaotic energy disrupts disciplined techniques
interaction_explanation.neutral_with: Physical (self-mastery) and Cold - Perfect martial discipline, balanced opposition with preservation's stillness
